Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalgoals

Class PersonalGoalCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalgoals.PersonalGoalCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PersonalGoalCard extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a personal goal card with a grid of objectives. Each objective is represented by an ItemType value.
